title: New season 7 patch made in game shop kinda big
body: Its not big enough where i cant press sell but all the item's squares are huge i know the difference and it didnt happen before i patched it. I tried changing resolutions but it didnt work. I need helpp :(( its getting on my nerves. the item squares are bigger than my cursor.  and if i took a picture of it for you guys it would look normal sized so im stuck :(.

replies.body: I've never heard of this issue before, especially where it won't show up in a screenshot. Can you perhaps snap a pic with a camera or smartphone and upload it to [Imgur](https://imgur.com/)?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UQpKo6N4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-11T04:10:25.344+0000)
>
> I've never heard of this issue before, especially where it won't show up in a screenshot. Can you perhaps snap a pic with a camera or smartphone and upload it to [Imgur](https://imgur.com/)?

If i did do that it would look normal, like an illusion or something. Thanks for trying to help though,I guess I'll just have to deal with it since no one else has this problem

I spoke with one of our techs and it should be resolvable by completing a game configuration reset. You can do this by first logging into League, then heading to your install directory **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)** then *delete* the folder named **Config**. You'll then want to hop into a custom match to confirm the changes.

Let me know if this helped.
